word: "THAT WE OUGHT NOT AS A DENOMINATION EITHER TO SEEK OR TO ACCEPT FROM ANY CIVIL GOVERNMENT, CHIEF, RULER, OR ROYAL CHARTERED COMPANY, SUPREME, LOCAL, OR OTHERWISE, ANY GIFT, OR DONATION, CONCESSION, GRANT, EITHER OF LAND, MONEY, CREDIT, SPECIAL PRIVILEGE, OR OTHER THING OF VALUE, TO WHICH WE ARE NOT IN COMMON WITH ALL OTHERS JUSTLY ENTITLED AS MEN WITHOUT ANY REFERENCE TO OUR RELIGIOUS PROFESSION OR RELIGIOUS WORK."
